channel.title: Payment terminals on Logotyp.us
channel.description: Recent content in Payment terminals on Logotyp.us

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Ingenico Logo Ingenico is a France-based company, whose business is to provide the technology involved in secure electronic transactions. Its traditional business is based on the manufacture of point of sale payment terminals, but it also includes complete payment software and related services, also software for merchants. Source
You can download theIngenicologo on full-version of the page. ]] >
item.title: Ingenico
item.description: Ingenico is a France-based company, whose business is to provide the technology involved in secure electronic transactions. Its traditional business is based on the manufacture of point of sale payment terminals, but it also includes complete payment software and related services, also software for merchants. Source
